1.0.name: wordpress/wp-testimonial-widget
1.0.description:
Using WP Testimonial Widget, you are able to manage the testimonials for your website. You can specify the number of testimonials to be displayed on your site on page or post or in widget.

There is shortcode [swp-testimonial] available to add testimonials on in post or page.

A few features: 1. Manage your testimonials. (Add, Edit, and Delete) 2. Set number of testimonials to display. 3. Fill the following information for each testimonial: Testimonial Title, Description, Company Name, Company Website. 4. Display testimonial in sidebar using widget. Configure widget using different available options. 5. Add shortcode to display testimonials in page or post. 6. Option to set different effects. 7. Option to select different display options.
